'''14w06b''' is the eleventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on February 6, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140207055427/https://mojang.com/2014/02/minecraft-snapshot-14w06a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w06b|date=February 6, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[14w06a]] snapshot.

== Trivia ==
* 14w06b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
